contextSubconfig.name: Context Menu
contextSubconfig.description: More options in the menu that appears when you hold down center click on a player.

payContext.name: Pay money
payContext.description: Adds the option to pay a player money.

clanInviteContext.name: Send Clan Invite
clanInviteContext.description: Adds the option to send a clan invite to the player.

autoFly.name: AutoFly
autoFly.description:
Automatically execute §b/fly §feverytime you join a sub server of §bOPSUCHT.net§f.
Only works with §cPLATIN §fand higher ranks.

coloredMentions.name: Colored mentions
coloredMentions.description: Every instance of @<Name> you receive as a chat message gets replaced by the colored version §b@<Name>
